attributes.action: Keep John Terry as the England Captain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: keep John Terry as as the England captain as what happens of the pitch as nothing to do with what happens of the pitch. he is England's best defender and we need to keep him!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the FA, not Government
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
